Package net.ttddyy.dsproxy.support

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProxyDataSourceBuilder.SingleMethodExecution
    Functional interface to simplify adding MethodExecutionListener.
    ProxyDataSourceBuilder.SingleQueryExecution
    Functional interface to simplify adding QueryExecutionListener.
    QueryCountLogEntryCreator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor  
    AbstractQueryCountLoggingRequestListener  
    AbstractQueryCountLoggingServletFilter
    Servlet filter to output query statistics.
    BeanNameProxyDataSource
    Extending ProxyDataSource to use spring bean name(id) as dataSourceName when it is not set.
    CommonsLogUtils  
    CommonsQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor
    Spring HandlerInterceptor to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
    CommonsQueryCountLoggingRequestListener
    ServletRequestListener to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
    CommonsQueryCountLoggingServletFilter
    Servlet Filter to log the query metrics during a http request lifecycle using Apache Commons Logging.
    DataSourceProxyNativeJdbcExtractor
    Spring NativeJdbcExtractor for our proxy classes.
    DefaultQueryCountLogEntryCreator
    Default implementation of QueryCountLogEntryCreator.
    JULQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor  
    JULQueryCountLoggingRequestListener  
    JULQueryCountLoggingServletFilter  
    ProxyConfigSpringXmlSupport
    ProxyConfig bean creation support for XML based spring configuration.
    ProxyConnectionAdvice
    Support injecting proxies by AOP.
    ProxyDataSource
    A proxy of DataSource with QueryExecutionListener.
    ProxyDataSourceBuilder
    Builder for ProxyDataSource.
    QueryCounterClearFilter
    Servlet filter to clear the QueryCount stored in thread local at the end of the http servlet request lifecycle when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
    QueryCounterClearHandlerInterceptor
    Spring HandlerInterceptor to clear QueryCount stored in thread local when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
    QueryCounterClearServletRequestListener
    ServletRequestListener to clear QueryCount stored in thread local when DataSourceQueryCountListener is used.
    QueryCountLoggerBuilder
    Builder for QueryCountLogging related classes.
    SLF4JLogUtils  
    SLF4JQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor  
    SLF4JQueryCountLoggingRequestListener  
    SLF4JQueryCountLoggingServletFilter  
    SystemOutQueryCountLoggingHandlerInterceptor
    HandlerInterceptor to log query metrics to System.out.
    SystemOutQueryCountLoggingRequestListener
    ServletRequestListener to log query metrics per http request using System.out.
    SystemOutQueryCountLoggingServletFilter
    Servlet Filter to log query metrics per http request using System.out.
